author: Al Jazeera
title: China's Hubei to ease some travel curbs after months of lockdown
description: Province says travel will be allowed for people with health clearance, while imported cases increase across the country.
content:
China's Hubei province, the original epicentre of the coronavirus pandemic, is due to begin relaxing many travel restrictions to and from the region after months of lockdown.
The Hubei Health Commission announced on Tuesday that it would lift curbs on outgoi… [+3849 chars]
